Description: Fragment of foot and lower wall of Ionian pottery cup; slight, flaring ring foot. Interior glazed with three added red lines at mid-wall, two on floor. Exterior reserved.
Curator's comments: For the reserved exterior compare 1965,0930.478, the upper parts of a (different) ledge-rim bowl.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1161)
